languages.text: "Наследник дома Эрэбис вернулся на флагман... До сих пор не верится!"

traits.locale_text: "Наследник дома Эрэбис вернулся на флагман и служит на капитанском мостике... До сих пор не верится".

languages.text: "The heir of House Erebis, back on the flagship... I still can't believe it!"
languages.original_text: "Наследник дома Эрэбис вернулся на флагман... До сих пор не верится!"

traits.locale_text: "The heir of House Erebis has returned to the flagship... I still can't believe it!"
"The heir of House Erebis has returned to the flagship... I still can't believe it!"
"The heir of House Erebis, back on the flagship... I still can't believe it!"
"The heir of House Erebis, back on the flagship... I still can't believe it!"
"The heir of House Erebis, back on the flagship... I still can't believe it!"
"The heir of House Erebis, back on the flagship... I still can't believe it!"

languages.text: « L'héritière de la maison Erebis, de retour sur le vaisseau amiral... Je n'arrive pas à y croire ! »
languages.original_text: "The heir of House Erebis, back on the flagship... I still can't believe it!"

traits.locale_text: « L'héritière de la maison Erebis, de retour sur le vaisseau amiral... Je n'arrive pas à y croire ! »

languages.text: «El heredero de la casa Erebis ha vuelto a la nave insignia... ¡Todavía no me lo creo!».
languages.original_text: "The heir of House Erebis, back on the flagship... I still can't believe it!"

traits.locale_text: «El heredero de la casa Erebis ha vuelto a la nave insignia... ¡Todavía no me lo creo!».

languages.text: 「エレビス家の跡継ぎが旗艦に戻れるなんて…まだ信じられません！」
languages.original_text: "The heir of House Erebis, back on the flagship... I still can't believe it!"

traits.locale_text: 「エレビス家の跡継ぎが旗艦に戻れるなんて…まだ信じられません！」

languages.text: “伊雷比斯家族的继承人回到了旗舰上……我还是感觉像是做梦一样！”
languages.original_text: "The heir of House Erebis, back on the flagship... I still can't believe it!"

traits.locale_text: “伊雷比斯家族的继承人回到了旗舰上……我还是感觉像是做梦一样！”

languages.text: "Der Erbe von Haus Erebis, wieder auf dem Flaggschiff ... Ich kann es noch immer nicht glauben!"
languages.original_text: "The heir of House Erebis, back on the flagship... I still can't believe it!"

traits.locale_text: "Der Erbe von Haus Erebis, wieder auf dem Flaggschiff ... Ich kann es noch immer nicht glauben!"

languages.text: "Erebis Hanesi'nin vârisi, sancak gemisine geri dönmüş... Hâlâ inanamıyorum!"
languages.original_text: "The heir of House Erebis, back on the flagship... I still can't believe it!"
